<script>
async function loadHTML(filename) {
    try {
        const response = await fetch(filename);
        let html = await response.text();

        // Replace local dev paths with CDN versions
        html = html.replace(
            '<link rel="stylesheet" href="../src/ui/css/styles.css" />',
            '<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/maidr@latest/dist/maidr_style.css" />'
        );

        html = html.replace(
            '<script type="text/javascript" src="../dist/maidr.js"><\/script>',
            '<script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/maidr@latest/dist/maidr.js"><\/script>'
        );

        const container = document.getElementById("content");
        container.hidden = false;

        // Insert HTML content
        container.innerHTML = html;

        // Execute embedded scripts manually
        const scripts = container.querySelectorAll("script");
        for (const oldScript of scripts) {
            const newScript = document.createElement("script");

            // Copy attributes
            for (const attr of oldScript.attributes) {
                newScript.setAttribute(attr.name, attr.value);
            }

            // Inline JS content
            newScript.innerHTML = oldScript.innerHTML;

            // Replace old script
            oldScript.replaceWith(newScript);
        }

    } catch (err) {
        console.error(err);
        document.getElementById("content").innerText = "Failed to load example.";
    }
}
</script>
